name: ibex
description: Framework for browser, with the same API than koa 2
author: Christophe Hurpeau <christophe@hurpeau.com> (http://christophe.hurpeau.com/)

scripts.prepare: ln -s ../../git-hooks/pre-commit .git/hooks/pre-commit 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/post-checkout .git/hooks/post-checkout 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/post-merge .git/hooks/post-merge 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/prepare-commit-msg .git/hooks/prepare-commit-msg 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.prepublish: ln -s ../../git-hooks/pre-commit .git/hooks/pre-commit 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/post-checkout .git/hooks/post-checkout 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/post-merge .git/hooks/post-merge 2>/dev/null || true ; ln -s ../../git-hooks/prepare-commit-msg .git/hooks/prepare-commit-msg 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.preversion: yarn run lint && yarn run build && pob-repository-check-clean
